p: The virological study of CHIKV can shed light on the isolated strains of ZIKV from Brazil, as the global epidemic and distribution of both viruses is similar. Phylogenetic analysis has shown that the Brazilian strains of ZIKV have evolved in a mixed way. A study suggested that isolated strains were closely related to Cambodian strain in 2010 ( 61), while presented 99% resemblance with French Polynesian strain in 2013. Brazilian Zika virus strains coming from Asian lineage had alteration in 6â€“15 amino acids as compared to the French Polynesian strain ( 30).
